page.title: 15THE BY-PASS HUNTLY
page.content: The Huntly by pass is the main road that runs past Huntly diverting traffic away from the town. The by-pass prevents traffic running through Duke St, a main street in Huntly. I asked some shopkeepers in that street if this had affected their trade any. Centra (SUPERMARKET),"No, not at all". Newsagent, "There is a slight differance in the summertime,but other times not at all". Co-op (SUPERMARKET),"No,no difference at all" Small newsagents ,"Good, as the one way traffic can stop and there are no large vehicles shaking the building". So the opinions are mixed. The By-pass was officialy, opened in 1979. The Garden centre, built beside the By-pass, has a restaurant,car park and allows bus parties, so really,it takes its trade from the By-pass.
